About

Open source software for safe airspace usage

Today, all developed countries have the same problem with civil drone use. This problem is in providing safe usage of a single airspace for a lot of drones. It is significant to solving this problem via decentralized technologies.

Drone employee is opensource software, which can provide safe airspace usage. Drone employee is scalable solution for using to the tune of single park zone to the whole country airspace. Blockchain technology allows us to realize that.

Therefore Drone Employee is solution that provides Blockchain technology for Global civil drone vendors today.

  • No matter what the area size: park, city, state, country, world.
  • Open source implementation. Just what you need for use — download install package.
  • Ready-to-use documentation and support on request.
  • Provides secure multiple flying drones

In Drone Employee we use following technologies

Alfa version solution stack:

  • Ethereum network client geth
  • ROS
  • OpenTopography
  • Ubuntu OS
  • Aira IoT bridge and Aira core

Beta version (coming Summer 2016) solution stack:

Beta version (coming Summer 2016) solution stack:

Beta version (coming Summer 2016) solution stack:

Here it is list of technologies that we want to add in the next 6 months:

  • IBM Blockchain for DAO private ledger implementation
  • 3DR compatibility field tested releases
  • Aira Autonomous agent application for interacting Human-to-Robot with UI
  • USA air traffic control autonomous agents via opentopography area data
